#!/usr/bin/env python
from pathod import pathoc

p = pathoc.Pathoc(("google.com", 80))
p.connect()
print(p.request("get:/"))
print(p.request("get:/foo"))
description: An interactive TLS-capable intercepting HTTP proxy for penetration testers and software developers.
